S06bsu023_u:4_0: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /
S06bsu023_u:4_1: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
S06bsu023_u:5_0: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ,
S06bsu023_u:5_1: aṅkurātpatram, patrātkāṇḍam, kāṇḍānnāḍam, nāḍāddaṇḍaḥ, daṇḍādgarbhaḥ, garbhācchūkaḥ, śūkātpuṣpam, puṣpātphalamiti / asati bīje aṅkuro na bhavati,
S06bsu023_u:5_2: evaṃ yāvat asati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:5_4: evaṃ yāvat sati ca puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S06bsu023_u:5_5: tatra ca punarbījasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:5_6: etena nirīhatvam / aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:5_7: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:5_8: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:5_9: atha bīje sati ca kāraṇabhūte aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu023_u:5_10: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:5_11: evaṃ ca bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:6_0: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 109) punaḥ kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
S06bsu023_u:6_1: svabhāvadhāraṇāddhātuḥ / katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśadhātusamanvayādbāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:6_11: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya dhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /
S06bsu023_u:6_12: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomi iti /
S06bsu023_u:6_13: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:6_14: atha punaḥ satsu pratyayeṣu teṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
S06bsu023_u:6_15: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaśca /
S06bsu023_u:7_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
S06bsu023_u:7_3: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
S06bsu023_u:7_5: aṅkuraścotpadyate / ato na śāśvatataḥ // kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate,
S06bsu023_u:7_6: nāpyaniruddhādbījāt / api ca bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura utpadyate,
S06bsu023_u:7_7: tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat / ato nocchedataḥ // kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura ityato na saṃkrāntitaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:7_8: / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ bījamupyate(vyāptitvāt - avyā) vipulaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:7_10: / kathaṃ tatsadṛśānubandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:8_0: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 110) tatra punaścādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S06bsu023_u:8_3: evaṃ yāvadyadi jātirnābhaviṣyat(skandhānāṃ pañcānāṃ prādurbhāvo jātiriti),
S06bsu023_u:8_7: punaḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmapyevaṃ na bhavati - vayamavidyayā abhinirvartitā iti /
S06bsu023_u:8_8: evaṃ yāvajjāteḥ(skandhaprādurbhāvasya) naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:8_9: jarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jātyābhinirvartita iti /
S06bsu023_u:8_10: atha ca satyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇāmabhinirvṛttiebhavati prādurbhāva eva,
S06bsu023_u:8_11: evaṃ yāvat jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:9_0: punaḥ kathamādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:9_1: tatrādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katama iti? yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ(saṃparkāt) kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:9_2: ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ // yaḥ punaḥ kāyasya parigrahakṛtvaṃ(svīkārasaṃcayakṛtyaṃ) karoti,
S06bsu023_u:9_3: ayamucyate abdhātuḥ // yaśca punaḥ kāyasya aśitaṃ pītaṃ bhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ /
S06bsu023_u:9_6: ayamucyate ākāśadhātuḥ // yo nāmarūpamabhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena cakṣurādipañcavidhavijñānakāya(vijñānasamūha) - saṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ(sāvaraṇaṃ) manovijñānam,
S06bsu023_u:9_7: ayamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ // asatsu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirna bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:9_11: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya kaṭhinatvamabhinirvartayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:9_12: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 111) abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasyānuparigrahaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:9_13: tejodhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya aśitapītakhāditaṃ paripācayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:9_17: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayaviśeṣairjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:10_0: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā (na mukto na baddho) na jīvo na janturna manujo na mānavo na strī na puruṣo na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca mama,
S06bsu023_u:11_0: tatrāvidyā katamā? yā eṣveva ṣaḍdhātuṣu ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā,
S06bsu023_u:11_1: evamādi vividhamajñānam, iyamucyate avidyeti / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
S06bsu023_u:11_3: amī ucyante saṃskārā iti // vastuprajñaptiḥ(indriyavijñānacetanā) vijñānam /
S06bsu023_u:11_8: sparśānubhāvo vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā(adhyavasānaṃ kāṅkṣā sukhādyanubhavaḥ) /
S06bsu023_u:11_12: skandhavināśo maraṇam / mriyamāṇasya mūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasyāntardāhaḥ śokaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:11_13: śokenālapanaṃ paridevanam / cakṣurādipañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ asātānuśayanaṃ duḥkhapaścāttāpaṃ duḥkha(m) /
S06bsu023_u:12_1: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā aniñjyopagāśceti saṃbhāvyante avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
S06bsu023_u:12_4: Vaidya 112) bhavati, aniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmaniñjyo pagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:12_11: / yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate, iyaṃ sparśapratyayā vedanā ucyate /
S06bsu023_u:12_12: / yastāṃ vedanā (vedayāti) viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasa(sya?)ti (kāṅkṣati) adhitiṣṭhati,
S06bsu023_u:12_15: na me priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairviyogo bhavatu aparityāgaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:12_17: / evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena manasā vācā,
S06bsu023_u:13_8: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:13_9: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:13_10: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
S06bsu023_u:13_11: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayai (pratītyotpādai)rjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:13_12: / api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditamavidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati /
S06bsu023_u:13_14: / sa cāsau nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto nākāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:13_15: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogāt ṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādātprabuddhaṃ (MŚālSū,
S06bsu023_u:13_16: Vaidya 113) vijñānabījaṃ tatratropapattyā mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:13_17: asvāmikeṣu (dharmanairātmyena) adharmeṣu (pudgalanairātmyena) amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālambanasvabhāveṣu,
S06bsu023_u:14_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? cakṣuśca pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
S06bsu023_u:14_3: rūpamālambanakṛtyaṃ karoti, āloko 'vabhāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ākāśamanāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karoti,
S06bsu023_u:14_9: tatrāpi cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya āśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:14_10: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avalambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:14_11: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:14_12: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:14_13: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
S06bsu023_u:14_14: cakṣurvijñānasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayasamavāyairjanita iti /
S06bsu023_u:14_15: atha ca satsu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattiḥ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06bsu023_u:14_17: / tatra pratītyasamutpāde na kaściddharmo asmāllokātparalokaṃ saṃkrāmati,
S06bsu023_u:14_20: upādānāvaikalyācca jvalati, evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyā āyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
S06bsu023_u:14_21: asvāmikeṣu adharmeṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu,
S06bsu023_u:14_22: hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt / evaṃ ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:15_0: (MŚālSū, Vaidya 114) tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:15_3: tatsadṛśānubandhataśceti / kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
S06bsu023_u:15_5: na tu ya eva maraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
S06bsu023_u:15_6: ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavantīti na /
S06bsu023_u:15_7: ato hetorna śāśvatataḥ // kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
S06bsu023_u:15_8: nāpyaniruddheṣu / api tu maraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
S06bsu023_u:15_10: prādurbhavanti, tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat / ato nocchedataḥ // kathaṃ na saṃkrāntita iti? visadṛśāt sattvanikāyāt visabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantareṣvabhinirvartante,
S06bsu023_u:15_11: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ // kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ karma kriyate,
S06bsu023_u:16_0: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta śāradvatīputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatena samyakpraṇītaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitaṃ ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad (vi)parītaṃ ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akṛtaṃ asaṃskṛtaṃ apramitaṃ anāvaraḥaṃ śivaṃ abhayaṃ ahāryaṃ avyayaṃ avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
S06bsu023_u:16_1: asatyato 'saktataḥ asārato rogato gaḥḍataḥ śalyato 'nityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu023_u:16_2: sa na pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati - kimahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani āhosvinnābhūvamatīte 'dhvani,
S06bsu023_u:16_4: aparāntaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmyahamanāgate 'dhvani,
S06bsu023_u:16_6: ko nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmīti / pratyutpannaṃ vā punarna pratisarati - kiṃ nvidam,
S06bsu023_u:16_7: kathaṃsvididam, ki santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāma iti /
S06bsu023_u:17_5: tṛṣṇā yāvadbhava iti eṣā aparāntikī apekṣā,
S06bsu023_u:17_7: peyālam //" "tasyaivaṃ (MŚālSū, Vaidya 115) bhavati - saṃyogāt saṃskṛtaṃ pravartate,
S06bsu023_u:17_9: visāmagryā na pravartate / hanta, vayamevaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvā asya saṃyogasya asyāśca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:17_10: na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarva - saṃskārāṇāmadhigamiṣyāmaḥ sattvaparipācanatāyai" iti /
S06bsu023_u:18_1: tadāha - rūpaṃ tu dvividham, - varṇataḥ saṃsthānataḥ / te ca viṃśatidhā, tatra nīlādi nava, dīrghādyekādaśa / etatsarvaṃ rūpaṃ pāramārthikaṃ nāstīti pratijñā,
S06bsu023_u:18_2: svarūpeṇa hetuḥ / svahetunā tathaiva janito yathāvat paramārthikaṃ tu /
S06bsu023_u:18_5: "pararūpeṇa rūpaṃ nāsti, svarūpeṇa vā ubhayarūpeṇa vā anubhayarūpeṇa veti" śāstram /
S06bsu023_u:19_0: "na sat nāsat na sadasat na cāpyanubhayātmakam" / iti śāstram // //
S06bsu023_u:22_0: "na svati nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
S06bsu023_u:22_1: utpannā jātu dṛśyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana" //
S06bsu023_u:23_0: tatra sato vidyamānasyotpādāyogāt vidyamānasyotpāde niravadhijanmaprasaṅgenānavasthā syāt /
S06bsu023_u:23_2: tadeva cintyate - hetoḥ kimutpadyate sadasadvā? ubhayātmakasyotpāde viruddhadharmayorekasvabhāvatābhyupagamaḥ kathaṃ syāt? bhavatu viruddhadharmabandhanasvarūpaṃ ca pararūpanimittakam /
S06bsu023_u:23_4: sa ca bhedakaḥ / yatra parapratipattistatra kiṃ svarūpapratipattireva nāsti? pratītirasti,
S06bsu023_u:23_5: na svarūpapratipattiḥ / iyameva pratītiriti cet, tarhi apratītireva pratītiḥ /
S06bsu023_u:23_9: ataḥ siddhāḥ dvirūpatā / (MŚālSū, Vaidya 116) satyam, yadi vyavahartavyaikaśarīratāṃ tyaktvā prasahya rūpasyābhāvasya kiṃcidrūpaṃ syāt,
S06bsu023_u:23_16: parāpekṣāyāṃ so 'pi anityaḥ, anityaṃ prati vikalpe sarvaṃ pūrvadāpadyate /
S06bsu023_u:24_0: ataḥ svasmāt svayamutpadyate, anyasmādvā? nādyaḥ, prāganutpannaḥ svayamutpadyate /
S06bsu023_u:24_1: kimanutpannena rūpeṇa utpannena vā? anutpannena rūpeṇa anutpanna evotpannaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:24_4: tat kiṃ prāgabhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇotpadyate? yadyevam,
S06bsu023_u:24_5: tadā abhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ, paścādbhāva iti cet, tatra kimabhāva eva bhāvo bhavati? evaṃ sati abhāvasya punaḥpunarutpāde na prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
S06bsu023_u:24_6: anavadhirutpādaśceti pararūpeṇotpāde ca apūrvakotpāda evāṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt /
S06bsu023_u:24_7: na caivaṃ siddhāntaḥ, utpannena utpāde vā saṃsāreṣu utpādaviramābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ prayojanābhāvaśca /
S06bsu023_u:24_8: dvitīyo 'pi na, anyasmādanyotpādāt / atha vā - svayameva anyarūpeṇa utpadyate,
S06bsu023_u:24_9: svātmani kāritravirodhaḥ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt / na parata utpādaḥ, kutastatra siddhasya vā asiddhasya vā? uktamatrottaram - siddhasya utpādena kim,
S06bsu023_u:24_12: dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na bhavati iti nyāyāt /
S06bsu023_u:24_14: tathā anutpādaprasaṅgācca / kuta etat? asmātpramāṇāt / tadyathā - yat svatantraṃ na tat kādācitkam,
S06bsu023_u:24_15: yathā anyā sāmagrī / svātantryaṃ ca vivādapadam / tasmāt kādācitkatayā paratantratā vyāptā /
S06bsu023_u:24_18: kādācitkāśca bhāvāḥ / iti vivādapadam / yat paratantraṃ tatpratītyasamutpannam,
S06bsu023_u:24_19: yathā tadeva vījam / paratantrāśca bhāvā vivādapadam /
S06bsu023_u:26_0: iti vacanaṃ dhāryaṃ manasikāryaṃ sarvathā sarvadā sarvadarśibhiḥ //
